notification: You weren't born alone - Discover your birthday twins ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
footerTitle: Join us and uncover the secrets of past, present, and future generations in just a few clicks.
termsText: By submitting, you agree to our terms of use.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: Two selectors are at your disposal: the first is a calendar to choose your birth date, and the second is a selector for your country of birth. Once you've made your selections, click 'Submit'. After that, you'll be asked to specify your gender; click on this option to become a contributor. Finally, click the 'Discovery' button, which blinks green. You will then discover two new selectors: navigate according to your preferences to explore the statistics.

community.title: Join the G-Z community
community.description: Join the G-Z community and connect with people who share your birthday! Chat, form teams for upcoming competitions, and discover your birthday twins.
community.step3: 3. Click 'Back' at the top left to see groups for your month after 'Choose-your-team'.
community.step4: 4. Select the group that corresponds to your birth date.

flower.title: Flower of Life
flower.defaultMotivation: Submit your information to discover your floral motivation.
flower.shareWarning: Perfect for sharing in your Stories, just adjust it.
flower.fallbackShareText: Check out my G-Z Flower: {{month}} ({{day}}). Discover yours at g-z.online
flower.clipboardSuccess: Share text copied to clipboard! You can now paste and share it manually with the image. If the link doesn't work directly, please type 'g-z.online' manually in your browser.
flower.clipboardError: Unable to copy to clipboard. Please share manually. Remember to type 'g-z.online' in your browser to access the site.
flower.shareManual: Please share the image manually. Remember to type 'g-z.online' in your browser to access the site.
positiveTraits: Your creativity lights up the darkest challenges.
Your kindness is a rare gift in this world.
Your perseverance breaks barriers others can't see.
Your unique perspective solves the unsolvable.
Your energy is contagious and transformative.
Your patience reveals what others miss in haste.
Your courage faces fears that paralyze many.
Your wisdom guides you through life's maze.
Your optimism finds light in the darkest corners.
Your focus turns dreams into reality.
Your generosity creates ripples of change.
Your honesty builds unbreakable bridges.
Your compassion heals invisible wounds.
Your reliability makes you the anchor for all.
Your adaptability turns chaos into opportunity.
Your determination quietly moves mountains.
Your thoughtfulness deeply touches hearts.
Your enthusiasm ignites the passions of others.
Your intelligence sees patterns in the noise.
Your sensitivity reveals truth behind masks.
Your imagination creates new worlds.
Your confidence inspires without words.
Your humor heals what medicine cannot.
Your calm stabilizes turbulent waters.
Your curiosity unlocks life's mysteries.
Your empathy bridges impossible gaps.
Your intuition speaks truth before logic.
encouragements: Trust your inner voice; it knows your truth.
Your light is needed exactly where you stand.
Even small steps forward change your destiny.
The world needs exactly what only you can offer.
Your journey matters more than any destination.
Your authenticity is your greatest strength.
Seeds planted today become tomorrow's forest.
Your impact goes further than you will ever see.
When shadows fall, your inner light grows stronger.
What challenges you today empowers you tomorrow.
The universe conspires for those who dare to dream.
Your presence matters more than you realize.
Courage is not the absence of fear; it's moving forward despite it.
Your unique voice deserves to be heard.
The fire within you burns brighter than the obstacles ahead.

errors.futureDateSelected: You cannot select a future date for your birth date
errors.missingFields: Please enter a birth date and select a country!
errors.resetError: There was a problem resetting your data. Please try again later.
errors.flowerCodeMissing: Please submit your information first to obtain your Flower code.
errors.captureError: Unable to capture your flower. Please try again.

resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset your data? This will remove your information from our database.
resetSuccess: Your data has been successfully reset.
